snippet: "Losing It," about a 22-year-old virgin's one-night stand, has sold quickly in digital format. Now, she will be published by HarperCollins.
abstract: "Losing It," about a 22-year-old virgin's one-night stand, has sold quickly in digital format. Now, she will be published by HarperCollins.

headline.main: Self-Published Author Signs a Three-Book Deal, Heralding New Adult Fiction
